title: Insanely high ms
body: To start I play at the lowest graphic settings possible yet I still get lag and high ms. Anyone know how to fix besides buying a new computer lol.

replies.body: Is your FPS skipping or stuttering, or is it more like an input delay?  For example, when you use an ability does it take a bit of time to do it like you're standing in place, or is the screen just frozen?  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to help get an overview of what's going on.  Make sure to use it on games where this is happening.  Let me know!
